mapper.select: SELECT c.treat_no as treat_no , c.clnic_sttus_code as clnic_sttus_code , r.rcept_no as rcept_no , p.pat_name as pat_name , p.pat_code as pat_code , TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY') - SUBSTR(p.pat_brthdy,0,4) as pat_age , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(p.pat_brthdy),'YYYY-MM-DD') as pat_brthdy , c2.com_code_name as pat_gen , c1.com_code_name as pat_wait , c3.com_code_name as pat_path , c4.com_code_name as pat_first , c5.com_code_name as pat_day , c6.com_code_name as pat_hsptlz_status , e.emp_nm as emp_nm , hf.hos_fc_name as hos_fc_name , r.recept_time FROM tb_clinic c INNER JOIN tb_receipt r INNER JOIN tb_patient p INNER JOIN tb_common_code c2 ON p.pat_gen_code = c2.com_code AND c2.com_code_grp = 'GEND' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c6 ON p.pat_hsptlz_status = c6.com_code AND c6.com_code_grp = 'HSPT' ON r.pat_code = p.pat_code INNER JOIN tb_common_code c3 ON r.rcept_path_code = c3.com_code AND c3.com_code_grp = 'PVST' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c4 ON r.rcept_first_exam_code = c4.com_code AND c4.com_code_grp = 'FEXM' INNER JOIN tb_common_code c5 ON r.rcept_day_code = c5.com_code AND c5.com_code_grp = 'DAYN' ON c.rcept_no = r.rcept_no INNER JOIN tb_clinic_schedule cs INNER JOIN tb_hospital_facility hf ON hf.HOS_FC_NO = cs.HOS_FC_NO INNER JOIN tb_employee e ON e.emp_no = cs.emp_no ON r.schd_no = cs.schd_no INNER JOIN tb_common_code c1 ON c.clnic_sttus_code = c1.com_code AND c1.com_code_grp = 'STAT' WHERE c.clnic_sttus_code IN('PHWT','PING')

SELECT PAT_CODE , PAT_NAME , PAT_TEL , PAT_IHIDNUM , PAT_BRTHDY , (SELECT C1.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_PATIENT P1, TB_COMMON_CODE C1 WHERE P1.PAT_GEN_CODE = C1.COM_CODE AND P1.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND C1.COM_CODE_GRP = 'GEND') AS PAT_GEN_CODE , PAT_ADDR , PAT_DTL_ADDR, PAT_ZIP , to_char(PAT_FIRST_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS PAT_FIRST_DATE, to_char(PAT_LAST_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS PAT_LAST_DATE , (SELECT C3.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_PATIENT P3, TB_COMMON_CODE C3 WHERE P3.PAT_FRGNR_YN = C3.COM_CODE AND P3.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND C3.COM_CODE_GRP = 'YSNO') AS PAT_FRGNR_YN , (SELECT C2.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_PATIENT P2, TB_COMMON_CODE C2 WHERE P2.PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS = C2.COM_CODE AND P2.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND C2.COM_CODE_GRP = 'HSPT') AS PAT_HSPTLZ_STATUS FROM TB_PATIENT WHERE PAT_CODE = #{patCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BED_STATUS(PHYSIO_CODE, DETAIL_NO, BED_NO, BED_STAT_DATE) SELECT D.PHYSIO_CODE, D.DETAIL_NO,#{bedNo},SYSDATE FROM TB_PHYSIOTHERAPY_LIST D, ( SELECT C.DETAIL_NO FROM TB_CHART_DETAIL C WHERE C.TREAT_NO = (SELECT B.TREAT_NO FROM TB_CLINIC B WHERE B.RCEPT_NO = (SELECT MAX(A.RCEPT_NO) FROM TB_RECEIPT A WHERE A.PAT_CODE = #{patCode})) ) E WHERE D.DETAIL_NO = E.DETAIL_NO
mapper.select: SELECT A.BED_NO, CASE WHEN B.BED_NO IS NOT NULL THEN 'FULL' ELSE 'EMPT' END BED_STAT, A.BED_NAME FROM TB_BED A, (SELECT DISTINCT BED_NO FROM TB_BED_STATUS) B WHERE A.BED_NO = B.BED_NO(+)

SELECT PT.PHYSIO_CODE, PT.PHYSIO_COST, PT.PHYSIO_CONTENT, PTL.DETAIL_NO, PTL.PHYSIO_STATUS, TO_CHAR(PTL.PHYSO_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PHYSO_DATE, CD.TREAT_NO FROM TB_PHYSIOTHERAPY PT LEFT JOIN TB_PHYSIOTHERAPY_LIST PTL ON PT.PHYSIO_CODE = PTL.PHYSIO_CODE LEFT JOIN TB_CHART_DETAIL CD ON PTL.DETAIL_NO = CD.DETAIL_NO WHERE CD.TREAT_NO = #{treatNo}

SELECT C.TREAT_NO, PT.PHYSIO_CODE, PT.PHYSIO_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(PTL.PHYSO_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PHYSO_DATE FROM TB_PHYSIOTHERAPY_LIST PTL INNER JOIN TB_PHYSIOTHERAPY PT ON PT.PHYSIO_CODE = PTL.PHYSIO_CODE INNER JOIN TB_CHART_DETAIL CD ON PTL.DETAIL_NO = CD.DETAIL_NO INNER JOIN TB_CLINIC C ON C.TREAT_NO = CD.TREAT_NO INNER JOIN TB_RECEIPT RC ON RC.RCEPT_NO = C.RCEPT_NO INNER JOIN TB_PATIENT P ON P.PAT_CODE = RC.PAT_CODE WHERE P.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND C.CLNIC_STTUS_CODE = 'REND'

SELECT A.RCEPT_NO, A.PAT_CODE , E.PAT_NAME , E.PAT_BRTHDY , E.PAT_GEN_CODE , A.RCEPT_PATH_CODE, A.RCEPT_FIRST_EXAM_CODE, A.RCEPT_DAY_CODE, A.RCEPT_MEMO, A.SCHD_NO, A.RECEPT_TIME , D.PHYSIO_CODE , (SELECT PHYSIO_CONTENT FROM TB_PHYSIOTHERAPY WHERE PHYSIO_CODE = D.PHYSIO_CODE) PHYSIO_CONTENT , D.DETAIL_NO, D.BED_NO, D.BED_STAT_DATE, D.PHYSIO_YN , B.TREAT_NO FROM TB_RECEIPT A, TB_PATIENT E, TB_CLINIC B, TB_CHART_DETAIL C, TB_BED_STATUS D WHERE A.PAT_CODE = E.PAT_CODE AND A.RCEPT_NO = B.RCEPT_NO AND B.TREAT_NO = C.TREAT_NO AND C.DETAIL_NO = D.DETAIL_NO AND D.BED_NO = #{bedNo}

SELECT BS.BED_NO, P.PAT_CODE, P.PAT_NAME, P.PAT_BRTHDY, C.CLNIC_STTUS_CODE, LISTAGG(PT.PHYSIO_CODE, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY PT.PHYSIO_CODE) AS PHYSIO_CODE, LISTAGG(PT.PHYSIO_CONTENT, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY PT.PHYSIO_CODE) AS PHYSIO_CONTENT FROM TB_CHART_DETAIL CD JOIN TB_PHYSIOTHERAPY_LIST PTL ON CD.DETAIL_NO = PTL.DETAIL_NO JOIN TB_PHYSIOTHERAPY PT ON PT.PHYSIO_CODE = PTL.PHYSIO_CODE JOIN TB_BED_STATUS BS ON PTL.PHYSIO_CODE = BS.PHYSIO_CODE AND PTL.DETAIL_NO = BS.DETAIL_NO JOIN TB_CLINIC C ON CD.TREAT_NO = C.TREAT_NO JOIN TB_RECEIPT RC ON C.RCEPT_NO = RC.RCEPT_NO JOIN TB_PATIENT P ON P.PAT_CODE = RC.PAT_CODE WHERE C.CLNIC_STTUS_CODE = 'PING' GROUP BY BS.BED_NO, P.PAT_CODE, P.PAT_NAME, P.PAT_BRTHDY, C.CLNIC_STTUS_CODE ORDER BY BS.BED_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BED_STATUS A SET A.PHYSIO_YN = 'Y' WHERE A.PHYSIO_CODE = (SELECT B.PHYSIO_CODE FROM TB_PHYSIOTHERAPY B WHERE B.PHYSIO_CONTENT = #{physioContent}) AND A.BED_NO = #{bedNo}
